title: Warm potted shrimps on shredded lettuce
ingredients: ['1 egg', 'A pinch of dried mustard', '1-2 tablespoons lemon juice', '300ml (10fl oz) olive oil', '4 x 55g (2oz) pots of potted shrimps', '4 heads Little Gem lettuce, washed, dried and finely sliced', 'Petals from 2 marigold flowers (optional)']
